title: Luminar Stock Plunges After Q2 Earnings: Here's Why
snippet: Luminar Technologies, Inc. LAZR released its second-quarter results after Tuesday's closing bell. Here's a look at the key figures from the quarter. The Details: Luminar Technologies reported quarterly adjusted losses of $1.49 per share, which missed the Street estimate for losses of $1.18.

title: Luminar: Keep Selling As Revenue Trouble Surges
snippet: Luminar faces financial challenges with revenue misses, slashed guidance, and cash burn. LAZR's balance sheet remains weak with looming debt maturities. See more.

title: Deutsche Bank remains cautious on Luminar Technologies given uncertainty with Volvo, non-core exit
snippet: Luminar Technologies (LAZR) hits an all-time low after weak Q2 results and a dim outlook. Discover challenges, new revenue potential, and analyst insights.

title: Options Volatility and Implied Earnings Moves Today, August 12, 2025
